professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in database management and administration across various platforms.

key_responsibilities: Administering Oracle databases across multiple platforms including HP-UX
Performing daily production problem resolution and change requests using SQL*Plus and OEM Grid Control.
Conducting physical and logical backups as well as logical exports/imports.
Implementing and managing Oracle Real Application Clusters (RAC) and Oracle Enterprise Manager.
Handling physical and logical failover/Switchover operations with zero downtime using Data Guard.
Performing regular maintenance tasks including transportable tablespaces
